parameter.name: ELMAH SQL Connection String
parameter.description: Enter a SqlClient connection string for the GIS ELMAH database (typically using the elmahlogger account).

parameter.name: ELMAHApplicationName
parameter.description: Enter one of the following (matching the target environment): GIS Geodata API, GIS Geodata API (starappstage2), or GIS Geodata API (starappdev2).

parameter.name: ELMAHEmailSenderAlias
parameter.description: Enter one of the following (matching the target environment): elmah@richmondgov.com, elmah_stage@richmondgov.com, or elmah_dev@richmondgov.com.

parameter.name: ELMAHEmailRecipients
parameter.description: Enter one or more semicolon-delimited email accounts or Outlook groups to receive ELMAH emails.

parameter.name: ELMAHEmailSubject
parameter.description: Enter one or more semicolon-delimited email accounts or Outlook groups to receive ELMAH emails.
